description: four lines of calligraphy with smaller, shorter fifth line at L; brown mount with blue brocade
inscription: 上大人丘一已化三 | 千七十子你小生八 | 九子可作仁可 | 知礼也 The supremely great man Confucius, just a single individual, transformed 3070 disciples. You, my students, number only eight or nine. Can you negate Humaneness, or depart from Propriety? (SA)
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio:半潭秋水一房山; LLQ, square intaglio:　趙養図書; LLQ, square relief:　仲颐別号陶斎
text:
上大人丘一已化三 / 千七十子你小生八 / 九子可作仁可 / 知礼也
The supremely great man Confucius, just a single individual, transformed 3,070 disciples. You, my students, number only eight or nine. Can you negate Humaneness, or depart from Propriety'
(Trans. Stephen Addiss)
title: Confucian Exhortation
